00043 class canonLine: protected canon {
00044   public:
00045     const std::string getLine() {return myLine;};
00046     const gp_Ax1 getStart() {return status.getStartPose();};
00047     const gp_Ax1 getEnd() {return status.getEndPose();};
00048     int getN(); //returns the number after N on the line, -1 if none
00049     int getLineNum(); //returns the canon line number
00050     const machineStatus* getStatus(); //returns the machine's status after execution of this canon line
00051     virtual bool isThisMotion() = 0;
00052     static canonLine* canonLineFactory (std::string l, machineStatus s);
00053     //static void setToolVecPtr(std::vector<tool> *t);
00054     const std::string getCanonType();
00055     const TopoDS_Shape& getUnSolid() {return myUnSolid;}; //FIXME: use dispShape instead? one obj for both solid and unsolid? throw in highlighting as well?
00056     virtual const TopoDS_Shape& getShape()=0;
00057     bool checkErrors() {return errors;};
00058   protected:
00059     canonLine(std::string canonL, machineStatus prevStatus);
00060     std::string myLine;
00061     machineStatus status; //the machine's status *after* execution of this canon line
00062     std::vector<std::string> canonTokens;
00063     double tok2d(uint n);
00064     inline int tok2i(uint n,uint offset=0);
00065     void tokenize(std::string str, std::vector<std::string>& tokenV,
00066                   const std::string& delimiters = "(), ");
00067     inline void tokenize();
00068     const std::string getCanonicalCommand();
00069     bool errors;
00070 
00072     inline bool clMatch(std::string m) {
00073       return (m.compare(canonTokens[2]) == 0); //compare returns zero for a match
00074     }
00078     TopoDS_Shape myUnSolid;
00079 };
